Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine cornstarch and sugar in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Gradually blend in water, stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, then remove from heat. Stir in butter, lemon juice, nutmeg, and salt.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat until it is hot, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Bake the dish in the oven for 12 minutes until done. Serve while warm.
